attributes.action: I would like the sale of fireworks banned to ordinary members of the public.
attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks in the wrong hands are extremely dangerous, in Scotland from 15 Oct 2019 to Nov 2019, over half of the admissions to A & E due to fireworks where children. 
NHS England have said that in the last 5 years there has been nearly a 1000 admissions to hospital due to firework accidents, in 2018-19 NHS Digital explains that over 2000 people going to A & E was linked to fireworks.
There are numerous reports all over the United Kingdom of Police and Fife-fighters being attacked at this time.
attributes.background: I would like to propose that the government enact a law which bans the sale of fireworks to the general public.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
